attributes.action: Recognise that the only workable answer to the current fuss about Scottish MPs voting on purely English matters (the West Lothian Question) is regional government for England with elections and powers similar to those of the Scottish Parliament.  Six or seven regions would each have a population greater than Scotland’s.  A single English Parliament or Grand Committee would be too much of a rival to the UK Parliament.  The Welsh Assembly’s powers should be increased to match
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
